channel.title: projects on jhchabran
channel.description: Recent content in projects on jhchabran

item.title: The stories of open source developers and their projects
item.description: I love hearing other developers recounting the story of how a project has started and evolved. There is so much to learn from others and what they experienced. I find it especially fascinating when the story is being told in an informal setting, allowing for anecdotes and personal insights to surface. So I recently decided to build a blog where I collect interviews from open source contributors, How did it start?
